Seeing the whole gang together being themselves was refreshing, and nothing bad happened to them, which is always a plus!Loved Enrapture!The Initiation by Kristin VaydenI really enjoyed this book and seeing a bit of a tie in to Endure by Rachel Van Dyken. In the initiation we meet Khan, Sofia, Daphne, and Jude.Daphne has crushed on Khan for years since she met him through her brothers girlfriend Sofia. She never thought he'd give her the time of day so she went on with her life until Jude comes in whisking her away to help save him.Throughout this book we learn Khan is the head of a family in the Russian mob and made some mistakes. We learn of his connection to Sergio and Andi as well. I loved how Khan was a tough guy but really just wanted to be happy and out of the craziness his life currently is.Daphne and Khan are amazing together and it sucked that just when things started to get really good the story ended. I really hope to see more of these characters in the future as they are definitely interesting and the story was great!Ice by Elise FaberThis is the first book of Elise Faber's that I've read and I will definitely be picking up the rest of the series when they release.In ICE we meet Ryker and Laila, two super awesome KTS Spies on missions to help people in need. Ryker and Laila have a past, she was young, she fell hard, he ran. But now that they are working together again and a few years older, Ryker realizes his mistake but convincing Laila is much harder than he expected.The missions their team goes on are intense, but the majority of this story focuses on them trying to stop a child sex slave/prostitution ring in San Francisco.  In such a short amount of time so much happens and I was on pins and needles. When their mission goes belly up, and they are in a predicament they have to learn to work together to save themselves.I really enjoyed the suspense in this book, but I really, really enjoyed the chemistry and banter between Laila and Ryker. I adored these two and hope to see more of them in new books by Elise Faber.

I know there are many people out there who don't like it when Queen is covered by another band so just try to listen to this as a My Chemical Romance or The Used fan. I think it's a great song and it's really their own interpretation of the song. This version has more harmonies in it than the original. It's really a great song if you are a fan of these two bands because they really didn't get together for any other songs that I'm aware of (I might be wrong but I really can't think off the top of my head if they recorded any other songs together).This brings me back to a time when these two were quite popular and they were friends and toured together. It's sad that that's not something that can happen anymore since MCR broke up but the memory of those good times live on through this song.

I actually am biased towards this song since I'm from California. This is of course a theme song to a popular TV show... I think, I honestly never saw the show but I think it was on The OC? I just like this song because it reminds me of California, well it is about California! So if you like the good sunny state that is California than you'll love this song. They make references to various part of the state like "driving down 101" and I just can't help feel connected to it. I think overall this is just a feel good song.This song is what I would call pop-rock? It has piano in it which if you've ever heard this song you'll recognize right away. Then it goes into pop-rock. I think this song is a song that can be sung along to as well.

I was actually surprised just how big this backpack ended up being and how many compartments it had. I feel like this is much more than a "yoga backpack" because it can really carry many different items and you can get really creative with it. Believe it or not I feel like this would be a great backpack to take camping or hiking. I think the straps that are suggested to hold a yoga mat could actually be used for a sleeping bag or blanket.This backpack has a lot of nice features that make it great for those who are active. There's a compartment for your phone right on the strap that goes across your chest. I've included a picture of me wearing the backpack showing this strap and my iPod Touch inside the Velcroed compartment. I could fit my Samsung Galaxy S4 in it but it was a really tight fit so I think it works best for smaller phones or iPod Touches/MP3 players.This backpack is SUPER COMFORTABLE to wear! I am actually still wearing it right now while I write this review because it's that comfortable. I think it has to do with the strap going across the chest instead of having two straps like most other backpacks have. The strap is cushioned and the back of the backpack appears to be cushioned as well. I believe the back is cushioned to protect a laptop though so like I said before this is much more than a yoga backpack because it can be used for many different things.There are two main big compartments, a medium sized compartment that has a zippered compartment within it for small items, and a small compartment on the very front. There's also a water bottle holder on the side and as I've said before the phone holder in the front. This backpack will be able to hold a lot of stuff and I think a wide range of people could find different ways of using it.I received this item at a high discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.

So first of all I want to say that these would be great for a number of different things but for me personally I think that these would be perfect when you have a group going to a theme park. I've bought Disneyland ticket holders, official ones from the park, in the past and every time the badge holder always rips off. It's frustrating because this is meant to hold your admission ticket!These are much better than other badge holders I've used before. I actually feel secure using these because they are much thicker and the enclosure is a little difficult to open. That might sound like a bad thing but to me I think that's a great thing because that means it won't accidentally open up on you which is something I've experienced with the Disneyland badge holders.If you are going to an event where you have to have an admission ticket to get in or to use certain things (i.e. you need your admission ticket at Disneyland to get Fast Passes) get these badge holders! It's the safest way and easiest way to keep track of your tickets that you will be using for that day. All you need is a lanyard to go with these and you're good to go.I received these at a high discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.

This is a really small yet secure pouch. It's big enough to carry what you need though. With this review I've included two pictures showing the actual size of this pouch. As you can see it's about the size of my hand. With that being said you can easily fit a phone, passports, credit cards, ID cards, and cash easily into this pouch.The great thing about this pouch is that it has RFID blocking built into that. What does that mean? That means the cards inside of the pouch can not be scanned unless they are fully removed from this pouch. This means your stuff is going to be secure which is a really nice feature when you are traveling and carrying important things.This pouch is very lightweight and can be worn in many different ways. There are two belt loops on the back of the pouch in case you want to secure it to the belt in which you are wearing. There is also a strap on the bag so that you can wear it around your neck or wear it like a purse. This pouch is what I like to call "gender neutral" meaning anyone can use it and you don't have to worry about it looking like a "purse".I received this item at a high discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.

These are neat stylus because they are a 2-in-1. It functions as a stylus AND a real pen. The pen has black ink and writes just fine because the shape of this is the size of an average pen, so longer than other stylus you might use.The pen pops out of the stylus so there's actually a hole in the middle of the stylus. This hole doesn't make the stylus not work(that's a good thing). I also tested pressing my finger on the stylus tip and it didn't at all touch the pen when it was retracted. This means you don't have to worry about pushing the stylus too hard on your device and accidentally having the pen tip touch the screen. With that being said make sure you have the pen retracted when you are using it as a stylus!Overall I felt this was a simple design and the overall stylus pen was lightweight which I find to be a good thing. I did find the stylus tip to be a bit smaller than other stylus I've used which I actually liked because it made drawing on my Kindle easier. You can really hold it like a pen/pencil when drawing with the stylus and I enjoyed that very much.I received this item at a high discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.

I ended up testing these out with 4 different devices that I have. I tested it out with my Samsung Galaxy S4, iPod Touch, Amazon Kindle Fire HD, and Lenovo laptop. These headphones interacted with them all differently but they all were able to produce good sound with them.Long story short if you want these to really work you need to be using them with an Apple branded product. I was able to play and stop my music when I used them with my Samsung Galaxy S4 but the volume control just wasn't happening. Interesting enough these would turn on the music on my Amazon Fire Kindle HD but would not stop the music nor would the volume control work either. When I used them with the iPod Touch everything was working the way it should. I could stop and play music and also change the volume with no problems.These will make the world dead to you. What I mean by that is you won't be able to hear anything beside what you are listening to. This ended up being a little scary to me as I tested these outside so what I would do is just have only one in my ear and then clipped the other to my shirt, by the way these come with a nice clip so that's something you can do! I've always been on the fence with noise isolating earphones because sometimes it's not the safest thing to not be able to hear what's going on in the world.If you look at the pictures I've provided with this review you'll see just how small and compact these are. They come with a nice carrying case and when you first get them they come in a rather nice box as well. There are several tips to choose from which are a really nice feature so that you can find the right tips that are going to work for you specifically.I recommend these for people who have an Apple branded device. You won't get the most out of these unless you have an iPod, iPhone, or iPad. If you want to use the remote and be able to control the music you'll need to have an Apple branded device. I also recommend these to those who want to silence the world because these will really block out any outside noise.I received these at a high discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.

This is a cute and small "purse" or a large wallet. I think that this is perfect for when you don't want to bring along your entire purse. I go to concerts a lot and I usually will bring along something like this so that I can bring just what I really need.I have a Samsung Galaxy S4 and I was able to put my phone with the case still on it in the biggest compartment of this bag. There was still a little room leftover too so I don't see any issues for people that have even larger phones, i.e. the Note phones.This bag has a little heaviness to it that I like about it. It says synthetic leather but I don't feel like it's "cheap" feeling at all. It feels very similar to a real leather purse which I think is a good thing because then the purse isn't going to be easily flying around when you are wearing it. The strap is adjustable so you can make it into a crossbody or a shoulder bag. The two compartments in the front are great for ID cards and debit cards and so on. Again I think this is a great alternative to bringing you entire purse. I think it's a great size that can carry what you need and then it's small enough so you can keep your valuables close to you.I got the black one that has a red lining. You can see in the picture how the red is a little noticeable even when it's closed but I think it's very stylish on top of being functional. I have the bag on my measuring board in the picture too so hopefully you can see the actual size of it.I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.

First of all I just want to say don't point this towards anyone when you decide to open it because it opens right away!This is a really nice umbrella. I feel like it's well made and it's quite sturdy. I included a picture with this review showing it with the tag still attached to it. This tag has instructions, which I hope that you can read in the picture because it's really nice to know how to actually use this umbrella. The only issue that I think some people might find with this umbrella is when it comes time to close it. You really have to have a lot of strength to close it until it clicks, as it says to do. If you don't have a lot of strength it might be an issue for you but I didn't have too much of an issue when it came time to close it.This umbrella came with some sort of sleeve and honestly I don't know if it's just meant to be for packaging or not because I didn't find it to be a necessity to put the umbrella in it but I can see it to be a great tool for those who don't want a wet umbrella lying around. Simply just put the umbrella in the sleeve and then you can put the umbrella anywhere without worrying about getting other things wet.This umbrella is a very nice size. I found it to be big enough where it's really going to protect you from the rain (or even the sun if you need it for that!). It's pretty much your standard sized umbrella but has an intense open and close. I think it's great because you really don't have to hassle with it. Just unsnap the closure strap, push the button, and there you go! I suggest trying it out before you really need to use it so you know what you're dealing with. Again make sure it's not pointing at somewhere when you do it though! It's a real quick release so make sure you have enough room around you when you open it.I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.

So first of all I want to say that I actually did test these out (semi accidentally) at the local Dollar Tree here. I was at the checkout and the sleeve was very near to the card reader as I slid my card into it and what happened was it gave the checker an error code which wouldn't let it read the card. I was a little shocked at first but then I put the sleeve in my purse and then ran my card again and it worked. So long story short these sleeves do work and your card can't be read when they are near them.These sleeves will only be able to hold one card at a time. I saw some reviews saying they are fitting two cards in them but I don't know how that's possible and I think that would be counterproductive when you're trying to protect your cards. If you put two in them they will rub against each other and will stretch the sleeve out so I suggest just putting one card in each sleeve.Unless your card says what it is on the edge (like how the PayPal business debit cards do) you might want to label what each sleeve contains so you don't have to pull all of the cards out when looking for a specific one. That's what I did, I simply just wrote on the edge with a pen which card the sleeve contained. I think doing something like that will keep you rather organized.I received these at a high discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.

I think that these are a great thing for those who love to be organized. I used to use just a regular hanger and just throw all of my scarves on that which wasn't being well organized at all. The regular hanger would always bow too because it just wasn't meant to be holding a bunch of scarves like that. These hangers, however, are a life saver because they are specifically designed to organize and hold many objects at once.These are rather nice looking. I think that they look rather stylish and will fit into anyone's closet. They aren't heavy at all but I feel like they are very sturdy and can handle the weight of multiple items. I've been able to fit even my thicker scarves on here but weaving them through the slots. There's a space between each slot that has been working out perfectly for my scarves.I can see these being used for many different things. I think they would be good to help organize ties, scarves, and accessories including necklaces and bracelets. I'm very happy to have these and I feel like I'm more organized now.I received these at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I've actually been using this to read books at night time in the dark. Sometimes when I can't sleep I like to find activities to do but I don't want to turn on the light in the room because I don't want to disturb others with it so this has been working out fabulously.Things I like about this LED Lighted Handheld Magnifier include the following:  -It's lightweight. It's not too heavy which means my arm/wrist doesn't get tired while I'm holding it for a long period of time while I'm using it to read in the dark.  -It lights up the pages pretty well in the dark! I've been actually using this in the dark without any other light source and it gives off enough light to do so.  -It's very easy to make things bigger. It's really easy to use, just like a regular magnifier glass. I do have glasses but I hate wearing them because I just never liked how glasses felt on my face so this is great because I'm able to see things more clearly without me having to wear it on my face. Also the light button is very easy to turn on and off.  -It's pretty compact and easy to store. This device isn't too big and I'm able to just put it in my pencil holder when I'm not using it.Things I don't particularly like about this product include:  -The only thing that I really don't like too much about this product is the fact that it uses 3 AAA batteries. There are no batteries that come with it either. It's not THAT big of an issue to me because I do have rechargeable batteries but I can see this might be an issue for some people.I recommend this product to those who read in low light settings or in the dark. It's been working out fantastically for me and I really recommend this to people who want an alternative to wearing glasses because honestly I've been able to use this instead of wearing my glasses which is what I enjoy the most about this product.I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review.

I actually love this top but I was a little surprised with the material. It reminds me of a bathing suit but I don't know if I'd be comfortable to actually wear it out in public as one.I am personally using it as a bra top. I'm normally a 34 B for my bra so I got the Medium/Large size for this top and it fits perfectly. The picture is a little misleading with the cleavage. Wearing it as it is doesn't really produce a lot of cleavage for me but I did come up with something to make it look like the picture. All I did was simply wear a strapless bra underneath this top with it and it produced cleavage like how there is in the picture.Overall I am very happy with this top and it was easy to put on and take off. It's really stylish and I recommend it to those who love a classy vintage/retro look.

It seems like most of these "channel" apps only really work when you already have a TV provider. With that being said they aren't really that "free". Sure you can watch some content, a little bit of this and a little bit of that, but if you want to watch specific things and the better quality content it will not work unless you have a provider in your home. I have a provider so I have no issues using this app and accessing everything within it but please be aware if you're looking to use this app WITHOUT having a provider in your home you won't be able to get the most out of it.

I actually use this as litter for my bunny. It's advertised as bedding but I only ever put it in his litter box. I've tried everything really and I always keep coming back to this "bedding" because it's the only thing that really handles the smell. I'd like to think that he likes this bedding instead of the shavings and other "litters" too. One major thing I notice is that his paws(he has white paws) don't get discolored when using this bedding as compared to when I use other litters so with that being said I think this is much more sanitary.

I do actually have an Apple brand case and overall this case compared to the Apple brand case isn't really all that different. They both overall function the same and they both look the same as well. The only major difference that I noticed was the backing. This particular case here has a more "cheaper" backing but that's to be expected with the price. Honestly I think that this case is perfectly fine and it'd be smart to just get this case instead of spending a lot on an official Apple branded one.This case has the following features:-It can be folded into a stand. The front flap can be folded so that the case turns itself into a stand for the iPad. This is really nice if you're in the kitchen and you want to be following a recipe. I can also imagine that it would be good if you're following a tutorial and don't want to be holding the iPad while following along.-There are cutouts where you need them. There's a cutout for the camera, volume controls, power button, ear phone jack, and most importantly there's a cutout for the charger which means you never have to take the case off for anything.-It can put your iPad to sleep thus saving battery life! When the case closes onto the iPad it safely puts the iPad to sleep which helps conserve the battery.-Comes in a really pretty color! Ok, I guess I'm a little biased about this one because I LOVE the color blue and the many different shades of it but I really enjoy this color and I think overall it's a very stylish case.I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review.

I think that this is a great "case" for those who are a little rough with their iPads and especially great for children. When I first received this product it wasn't really like your normal case that you would get for a tablet. It's super bendable but the great thing about it is how it molds onto your iPad. Simply just put your iPad into the case and it transforms it into something that I think is much better protected than other cases.This case does add a little more bulkiness overall to your iPad but because it does there's a protective barrier. Other cases that I've seen tend to be on the same level as the screen meaning if you accidentally dropped it the screen would end up having contact with whatever the iPad landed on. With this case if you dropped it there's a little barrier that prevents the screen from actually hitting whatever it landed on. I honestly can't say that this case would protect the iPad completely in the event that you do accidentally drop it but I believe that this case would definitely protect it better than other cases that I've seen.With all the being said I recommend this case to those who are prone to dropping their iPads or children who might be a little rough when using an iPad. It's really a good investment to get a case like this because accidents do happen.I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review.

I was a little hesitant about getting a selfie stick in the first place because honestly I rarely take pictures of myself BUT after receiving this particular "selfie stick" I was just amazed by what I could actually do with it. It ended up turning into something that is really useful for me.So the long story short of why I personally ended up LOVING this particular product was the overall ease of being able to use it and how it made taking video so much easier. I have a pet bunny that I enjoy filming and taking pictures of. Many times he gets "camera shy" but now that I've used this selfie stick to help capture videos and pictures of my bunny I've come to the conclusion that he wasn't really that shy of the camera but he was shy of my getting into his personal space. With this selfie stick I've been able to get my phone closer to him without scaring him off and I'm truly loving it because now I'm able to capture the moments of him that I couldn't before.Specifically this selfie stick is amazing technical wise because of the following:  -It's compact. It folds up nicely and compact so when you're not using it you can simply throw it into a backpack or purse.  -It comes with a wrist strap. This is nice because if you do in fact accidentally "drop" the stick while wearing the strap it won't fall to the ground but simple dangle from your wrist. You can actually just carry the stick by the wrist strap while you're not using it as well.  -Bluetooth built in. There's a button on the handle part that you simply push to take a picture with your phone. This is very convenient and I had no trouble pairing the stick with my Samsung Galaxy S4.  -It's not heavy. I was able to hold the stick in the air for quite some time, never once did my arm get tired of holding it. It's not heavy at all.  -It pretty much is compatible with any smartphone. The clamp that holds the phone is easily expandable so I imagine that most smartphones would be compatible with this selfie stick. I don't really see it being compatible with a phablet(like a large Note phone) or a tablet though as it doesn't expand THAT much.  -There are many angles that it can be adjusted to. I really like the fact that it isn't just set to one angle. There's the option of changing the angle of where the phone actually sits which means if you ever needed to take a picture of something that's hard to reach this selfie stick would work out perfectly for that. For an example, if you needed to take a picture of something under a car, in the engine, or in a place that's hard to reach this would be a great tool to have to do that!I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review.

This is my favorite song on the Tangled soundtrack for many reasons. It's a wonderful catchy song that is really uplifting for the most part. It does go into the chorus that can be not as uplifting but I still enjoy it none-the-less.I think the reason why I enjoy this song so much is because it's actually relate-able. The singer (Mandy Moore is singing as the character Rapunzel in this song) talks about her daily life but she still questions when will her life really begin because after all she's stuck up in the tower all day and not able to go out and explore.

I actually bought these because my original cable that charged my Samsung Galaxy S4 ended up dying on me. When looking up replacement cables I was shocked to find that the "name brand" ones were rather expensive. I'm happy that I found these cables here on Amazon because they are just working perfectly!I actually use these cables with another product that I got here on Amazon, which is this product here: Sentey 6-port 50w 2.4amp USB Charger Charging Station Full Smart Ports Auto Detect Technology Fasting Charge and Safety Ls-2225 Black Rubber Finish Charging Hub Multi port USB Charger Wall and Travel Charger for Apple Iphone 4-5-6 / 6 Plus, Ipad Air 2 / Mini 3, Samsung Galaxy S6 / S6 Edge and More- Retail Packaging-(black) Included Free Travel Pouch Protection Bag With this charging station and these cables I'm able to charge several of my devices at once.I use these cables to charge my Samsung Galaxy S4 phone and my Kindle Fire. I'm using the third cable to actually use with my Fire TV Stick and it's working just fine with that. I really recommend these cables to anyone who needs these types of cables for their phones, tablets, or other devices. It's a great cheaper alternative to buying the "name brand" ones(for an example buy these for a Samsung device instead of buying a more expensive Samsung branded cable).

This is a very interesting "bag" and I actually tried it out with my Samsung Galaxy S4. With my phone there was plenty of room still in the bag so this can easily be used with larger sized phones as well. There are many different reasons why I like this bag and I think that it can be used for more than just a phone.First off I want to go over specifically why it does in fact work really well with phones. For my phone I was still able to use the phone while it was in the bag which was awesome. There's a window on the back side too which I assume is there so that you can use the camera on your phone while it's in the bag. I felt it was secure and when it latched close it seemed to give it a good seal. It's a little tricky opening and closing it at first but I think that's a good thing because it really does feel secure in there.With the bag you'll get an armband and a lanyard. The armband might be a tad too small for those with bigger arms but I think it works perfectly to put around your wrist. It's really nice to have these things so that the bag stays attached to you directly. With that being said I think that this bag can also be used for other things besides a phone including:-car keys-money-ID cards/credit cards etc.-ticketsBasically anything you don't want to get wet is great to put into this thing and like I said with my phone there was a little room still so I don't see why you can't slide in some money and other flat items in there with you that you want to keep dry. I couldn't fit my phone case on my phone with it into the bag but this bag basically becomes your case for the time being.I really recommended this to more than just those who want it for when they go swimming. It's also great to bring to theme parks, especially if you're going on rides that may have water/waterfalls, it's also great for other elements where you don't want your phone getting dirty like going in the snow or off-roading in the dirt/sand.I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for a review.

It's an energy shot like others. Make sure you read the entire bottle before downing it because most energy drinks will actually say that a whole bottle is more than one serving. I myself can never drink a whole energy drink or shot because it makes me bounce off the walls. So with that being said I really think that you can get a couple of servings out of this particular energy shot because I did just fine. I actually recommend drinking a small portion of it first before drinking the whole thing to see how it is working for you.I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for a review.

I find overall Lana Del Rey can be depressing at times but that's just how she is. If you've read any of her interviews she's not one to shy away from "taboo" subjects like suicide and sadness. With that being said this song can be somewhat depressing but delivers itself in a delightfully hauntful way.She does have an interesting voice that reminds me of something you'd hear in vintage LA during the height of Hollywood glitz and glamour. I like this song but it might not be for everyone. It can change your mood so prepare for that.

I like these apps because it's an alternative to watching a channel on TV. I'm pretty sure you still have to have TV to use this app correctly. For an example, I have AT&T UVerse so apps like these will "sign in" to my UVerse account that that I can fully access on the content available on this app.I've been able to watch shows and specials with no problem when using this app. I use it on my Kindle Fire HD.

I use a couple of different things to take makeup off but I really like using these because they have nothing on them. What I'll do is use facewash and then use these rounds to simply wipe off the excess makeup and help get the bulk of it off my face. I think it's a much better alternative to a towel and they can be simply thrown away.I especially like using these around my eyes to get eye makeup off because like I said before they have nothing on them, meaning no cleaner or chemical etc., so I feel safe using them around my eyes.

Plain and simple this is just a glaze to put over your craft to make it finished. This brand is amazing and gets the job done. This is a great "sealant" to put on polymer figurines and charms. That's how I use this product. This bottle is a nice size and you'll be able to use it many times.To use this just simply put it on clay right after it's been baked. Then wait for it to dry and you're done! It seals the clay to protect it and gives it a shiny look.

An all-in-one case! This is an amazing case for a couple of different reasons. First off I want to say that overall this reminds me of back in the 90s when it was common to have your cell phone clipped to your pants. Now with that being said obviously this is an updated version of that but let's face it phones are getting bigger to the point that they are difficult to fit in your pocket so this set up hear helps that problem out.This is definitely a "rugged" case meaning it's going to be there for you when your phone accidentally goes flying which they tend to do from time to time don't they? Since this is a rugged type of case it's a little bigger and will add some extra size to your overall phone so take note of that. I don't think it's too bulky and again phones in general are just big these days anyway so it really shouldn't be that big of an issue.When you get this phone you're going to be getting a couple of awesome accessories including a screen protector, cloth, and stylus. These are all things you really need with a smartphone. The packaging isn't excessive so you can get right into the product and it's pretty self explanatory how to put your phone into the case. I will say the only "issue" that I saw with this case was that the kickstand was a little hard to pop out the first couple of times but it gets easier to pop out once you figure it out.I received this item at a heavily discounted price in exchange for a review.

It's the song that's probably stuck in your head right now "and I love it". This song reminds me of Bruno Mars and Michael Jackson in a way. It's sung quite well and I am impressed with the range and overall tone. I simply love this song and I think that it appeals to a wide audience.

The thing that I like most about these labels is that to me they give off a "vintage" look. These are simply amazing for mason jars and I consider them to be on the large size. I think that these labels would also work perfectly for shoe boxes as well.First of all I don't think this really gives off the "chalkboard" look too much due to the marker that it comes with. It's more of a paint look to me as it's not a piece of chalk that you'll be writing with. With that being said if you are quick enough to wipe the marker off of the label it does come off but if you leave it on too long it doesn't seem to want to come off. So with that being said make sure you know what you're writing before you jump right into it to make it have a clean look. I tested out a couple of labels and I suggest waiting for the marker to dry completely before removing the label so that you don't accidentally smudge it.Like I said before I consider these to be a large size so there's plenty of room to write a couple of words on it. I ended up putting one of the labels on one of my plastic bins and it appears to be holding so the adhesive is nice on these labels.I recommend these to people who aren't afraid to hand write something as these will pretty much turn out the best to those who can write well. You might have to test out a couple labels to really get a feel for it but the marker writes rather smoothly.I did receive this product at a high discount in exchange for a review but my review is real and honest.

Hopefully my review was able to get your attention so that you can find out why you should NOT get this game! First of all it's an app that costs money (99 cents or 99 Amazon coins) but it still has WAY TOO MANY ADS! So much in fact that it's really the main reason why I'm giving this game just 1 star. I wish I could actually give this game 0 stars because the ads really killed this game.Every "round" that I played ended with an ad popping up. Every ad was automatically clicked on with a popup that read along the lines of "Are you sure you want to follow this external link outside of Amazon" which means that it wasn't ads that were going to take me to the Amazon App Store but to games that were located outside of it which can really be an unsafe thing. There was an option to say no and to keep that setting to always say no but once I clicked on that setting the game just locked up and froze and nothing could be done.I'm pretty sure this is a knock off game even though it says "Flappy Bird Official" because it was WAY TOO HARD! You tap the screen once and the bird goes flying into oblivion. I was literally only able to get past two tunnels because the touch was just way too sensitive.I recommend this game to NO ONE! Everyone should avoid it at all costs and I wouldn't be surprised if it gets taken down from the store because it's basically an app that shows you a bunch of ads. There really is no game here since the controls are way too sensitive and it's impossible to play.

I ended up really enjoying this lamp a lot more than I thought I was going to! There are so many things that this lamp can be used for and there are several suggestions on the box. For me I'm going to use it as a nightlight, when reading, for emergencies, and out during camping.I tested this lamp out in a couple different areas and although it doesn't light up a whole room it does light up a specific area. The dome shape of it helps the light travel. The light can go to a pure white light setting as well as to a yellowish light setting. I think the yellowish light is easier on the eyes and I would use that setting for when you are reading or when you want a calmer light at night.What I really love about this lamp is the many different settings. There are 4 "buttons" on the actual lamp and I like how there really are so many different settings. You can go super bright or very dim, and everything in between. You can switch from yellow to white for the light. These 4 buttons though are simple touch buttons which I enjoy very much. I think that they are great because all you have to do is simply hold you finger down until you get the setting that you want. With that being said I think that's great for people who have a hard time pushing buttons as it's much easier to use these.This lamp has a very sturdy retractable strap on it. I can see myself hanging this light from a hook with this strap. It's located on the bottom of the lamp so if you would hang it from a hook it'll then act like a chandelier.The charging is very nice. I like that you don't have to worry about replacing batteries. All you have to do is charge this and it's good to go. It's very portable and very lightweight.I received this product in exchange for a review but I stand by my 5 star review. I love this lamp so much that I think I want to get another to keep in the tent trailer for camping.

I found this toothpaste to have a stronger taste than other toothpaste BUT it was only really strong to me while brushing. I didn't have a problem with the aftertaste. I felt like it was really working too. I've only been using it for a couple of days and to me it looks like my teeth are already starting to look a little whiter. I can only imagine how white my teeth will be with continue use.

This is a rather tricky game for a number of reasons. First of all you're going to have to find a place to put your tablet/Kindle when you play it. For me I just put it on top of my bookshelf and then it seems to be at the right height. If you can't find a place to put your device that can make a big different for if you can actually play the "game" or not.I don't like that this is a rather expensive app and you don't get everything. It is, however, a great alternative to buying the game for a system. So when you compare to buying the full game for a system this seems to be much cheaper BUT you are still going to have to spend some money if you want to unlock more than the couple of songs that it comes with.This is a great workout. For some people they see this as a game while others see it as a workout. It really is both and I find it to be fun and enjoyable. It's very comparable to the Just Dance games.I gave it a 4 out of 5 because it's a little difficult finding the right height each time of where your device should be. Sometimes it just won't cooperate and will tell me the room is too dark or another issue. I also don't like the it's much more expensive than other apps and you still have to pay extra to get more content. In the end I think it's good though because it's still cheaper than going to actual Zumba classes or buying it for a console.

It's Bejeweled! The jewel switching game. It's a classic and I've had no problems with it. I think that this will always be a classic game. This game has been popular for a long time but I don't feel like it's as popular as it used to be so many years ago.I recommend trying this game out because it's such a classic. It might not be on par for some people with today's other popular games but I still enjoy it. It's really easy so I think anyone can learn it easily.

This review might get a little personal and a little TMI but I just want to express why I like this product and needed to give it a 5 star review. First of all I usually use some kind of liner most of the time. I have irregular periods and I spot a lot. With that being said I need a liner but it's annoying having to deal with them all the time. I like this product for a number of reasons and now I'll discuss each reason in detail:The packaging is nice. It's not a plastic wrap but almost like a cloth wrap. This is nice because that means if you're out and about and need to use a liner you can do so discreetly. Anyone that may hear you in the bathroom won't notice you opening up the packages all the time if you are doing that which is a plus because I know at my own home questions will arise if package opening noises are heard a lot.It's a little thicker than the regular liner and that's a good thing! These liners are just the right thickness to catch things. They are also thin enough to be worn comfortably. I actually prefer these over the regular liners and I feel like they are just overall constructed better.I felt that these were a good price for what they are. They aren't meant to withstand too much but I think they are perfect for me to wear daily as extra protection, for "just in case" moments.

This is one of those catchy soft songs that can be found on various different radio stations. I think it can appeal to a wide audience. There's a reggae feel to this song but it also works as a soft pop rock song. Most likely you've heard this song played on the radio or at a store. I think it's a rather popular song that will be around for awhile.

I really like Pinterest. I actually use it to promote my various products that I sell online. I also use it to organize my writing pieces that have been published online. It's basically an app that lets you organize things from the internet. You can make different "boards" with various "pins" on them. Most websites out there are Pinterest friendly so it's really easy to add things to your boards directly from different websites.

This is the app/game for the Fire TV Stick and let me tell you your arm is going to get tired if you play this for too long. You play with the remote that comes with the Fire TV Stick so it's almost like you are playing a Wii game. If you're familiar with having to hold up a remote all game then you know what I'm talking about.It's Flappy Bird. It's just a simple scroller that can get really hard really fast. It's also an addicting game so beware! It's free so there's nothing to lose. I recommend trying it out just to see what all the hype was about. If you don't like it simply just get rid of it! Again it's free so you don't have to worry about wasting any money if you don't like it.

This is pretty much Minecraft just for your tablet. I don't really have Minecraft on my PC so I can't compare it to that but I used to watch someone play it years ago and from seeing that and now playing this on my Kindle it looks pretty much the same.I was a little surprised of the price given that most games are free on tablets with microtransactions but it is kind of nice just buying the whole game and getting the whole game.If you like building things, or have played Minecraft before, I think you would enjoy it. It's worth checking out and I must say it's nice playing it on a tablet. I don't think playing it on a phone would be much fun so I suggest this for those with a tablet or Kindle.

I'm aware that it doesn't state that it's waterproof anywhere BUT I'm just letting you know this is not waterproof at all. I decided to wear this at an event which made me tear up a bit and I was disappointed just how much it ended up getting all over my face. Besides that small issue I do like this product. I don't feel like it's too "heavy" at all.I have thick eyelashes already so this mascara helps make them stand out. I don't like black mascara but this black/brown color was perfect. It wasn't too dark at all for me. I had no issues with clumping as well. Since it's not waterproof it's easy to wash off and I think sometimes that's a good thing.I recommend this to someone looking for simple mascara and you're not looking for something that's waterproof.

I have had these before and I didn't like them in the past but I wanted to try them again because they were such a great deal through Amazon Prime Pantry. Unfortunately I just don't like them and can't.This review is hard to write because there are some "good" things about these cookies. First of all they came packaged well. They arrived with no broken pieces and nothing looked melted when I opened it. So that part of the cookies were "good". I just don't like the taste of these for some reason. They don't taste like regular Chips Ahoy. I don't think it's a defective batch because like I said I've tried them before and I didn't like them then either.So with all that being said I have to unfortunately give these cookies just a 2 star rating because I simply do not like the taste of them. Who knows though, maybe you might like them? As far as packaging and how they arrived though I'm happy about that, the taste of them makes me sad though. Might be Chips Ahoy brand but definitely does not taste like the regular ones.

If Thin Mints and Oreos had a "child" these would be it! It's a rather strong mint flavor that reminds me of a Thin Mint. The texture, however, is nothing like a Thin Mint. The outer cookies seem to be the regular Oreo cookies but the inside is all mint. These cookies are rather thin which can be a good or bad thing. It's good because you can easily pop a whole one in your mouth, it's bad because it's easy to eat a lot them!I'm giving these a 5 star rating for a couple of reasons. They tasted fresh to me and they tasted really good. All of the cookies came unbroken and I was happy with the packaging so I guess I have to thank Amazon Prime Pantry for that! I actually prefer these to regular Oreos and I think they are quite enjoyable.

I have issues with headphones and I seem to go through a lot of them but I've had these for several months now and they are really perfect to me. The issue that I usually have with headphones is ear related. Back in April of this year I developed an ear infection that developed from wearing my gaming headset too much when gaming. Ever since that happened I've been hesitant to put anything on my ears in general but the thing is I need headphones!Now to get to why these headphones are PERFECT to me! First of all they don't hurt. I usually have issues with headphones pushing too hard on my ears. I believe that's how I got the ear infection with my gaming headset. These headphones, however, are quite comfy. There is a cushioning on the ears that makes it feel rather nice. The ear pieces are not gigantic too and I really think that helps. The headphones that have ear pieces that cover the entire ear and press on hard can make it so there's no airflow between the ear piece and ear which (I'm thinking) is the recipe for an ear infection.So yes I'm going on and on about the ear infection but it's important because I know a lot of people that have had ear trouble and with a rise of the use of technology and things being put on the ears I don't think people realize what's happening. I can not use ear buds and I hate spending a lot of money on headphones so these are awesome!Now to the sound quality! AMAZING! Wow! I'm actually listening to Strobe by Deadmau5 right now and the overall sound quality is just amazing. You really wouldn't expect this great of a quality given how cheap these headphones are but they are amazing.Lastly I just want to say that these come with a nice sturdy cord. I feel that it's thick enough to last and overall this pair of headphones is amazingly built. Just overall everything is amazing that's why I HAD to give these a 5 start rating.

When I received this item I was pleasantly surprised to see just how small it was. Sometimes these new kitchen gadgets are quite large which makes storing a nightmare. I love this little slicer because it's quite compact enough that I can keep it one of my drawers in the kitchen.One of my biggest issues in the kitchen is being safe. I usually love using my grater but I have always had the issue of cutting my fingers when when washing it. This spiral slicer, however, seems to be rather safe when it comes to clean up. It comes with a cleaning brush which means my fingers are safe! Overall I think this is a safe enough gadget that if properly shown how to use to them a kid could use it. (Again I do suggest adult supervision since it has a blade but I felt that this is a much safer gadget than a grater)I'm giving this a 5 out of 5 mainly due to the design of the product. It's small and compact and most importantly to me it's safe. I've tried to cut pasta out of my life and now I technically don't have to because now I'm making zucchini pasta! I just love it and I recommend it to anyone curious about veggie pasta and want something that's easy to use and easy to clean.Disclaimer: I did receive this item at a highly discounted rate in exchange for a review but I think anyone would love this product and best of all it comes with a free e-cookbook!

I actually found these shoes at a Converse outlet but I wanted to do a review on them here to give a little detail on the color. This color is "sassafras" and to me the best way to describe it is that it's a purple brown color. With that being said you can really match these shoes with a wide range of other colors since it's not just one set color. I've worn it with purple outfits and I've worn it with tan light colored outfits. It's not too dark as black would be which I think makes it easy to wear with many different outfits.Converse in general aren't known for their arch support. It's basically been the same shoe this whole time so you either love them or you don't. I think that these are great for people who want a shoe that's going to stay on. I have always felt that Converse will somewhat mold to your feet and aren't really for those who have extra wide feet. I just love Converse and have about 20 pairs in different colors but this color seems to be my favorite since it matches with so many different other colors.

How do you really rate water? Well it's a personal decision! To me I think Dasani is the smoothest bottled waters out there at this price level. Sure you could spend a lot more on the fancier waters but this is really all I want to spend on bottled water. Plus to me some of those more fancier waters had an odd taste to them. Dasani is smooth. It's comparable to Aquafina but just a step above which is why it makes sense that this costs a little more.These particular bottles are the smaller ones. They are not the full size water bottle which means you can easily throw them in your purse, backpack, or whatever you're carrying around. With that being said I think that you can easily drink a whole one of these with a meal.

First things first, I view this as a drink and not "water". Yes it's called Vitamin-WATER but let's be real here. All you really need to do is read the label to find that there's a lot more than water in this drink. With that aside though I love this drink. It has a good flavor to it and is rather refreshing when it's cold. To me personally it's a substitute to soda, which makes sense since Coca-Cola is the company who makes this drink.Full list of ingredients in this drink are the following:Reverse Osmosis Water, Crystalline Fructose, Cane Sugar, Less than 0.5% of: Citric Acid, Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Fruit and Vegetable Juice (Color), Natural Flavors, Berry and Fruit Extracts (Apple, Pomegrante, Acai and Blueberry), Magnesium Lactate and Calcium Lactate and Potassium Phosphate (Electrolyte Sources), Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide), Vitamin B5 (Calcium Pantothenate), Beta-Carotene, Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine Hydrochloride), Vitamin B12, Manganese Citrate, Gum Acacia.So as you can see it's NOT water! I'm just making that clear to everyone but also, as you can see, it's packed with a lot of vitamins. I don't think it should be a something to be drank with the hopes of getting your daily vitamins but I think it's a great substitute to soda and is a good drink when you want something besides just plain 'ol water.I'm giving it a 5 out of 5 because I personally like it. I like that it's not that strong of a drink but still has good flavoring. I like that it's not carbonated. To me it's the "in between drink" between soda/sports drinks and water. Healthier than one but not completely good for you.

What can I really say about soap? Well, this particular soft is the "soft touch" dish washing soap that is a little more fancier than others. Long story short you're going to get softer hands when washing dishes if you use this soap. It's a little weird at first and I had my doubts thinking "how can a soap soften hands and wash dishes at the same time?" but that's basically what it does. Other soaps tend to dry my hands out when washing a big load of dishes but not this soap and most importantly it cleans the dishes as well.

I've recently been getting into essential oils and I'm happy to have been fortunate enough to be asked to do a review of this product because I think it's truly amazing. It comes in a nice compact bottle that is sealed very well. Upon arrival it was sealed with a "sealed for your protection" wrap which I'm thankful for because that right there shows it's good quality.This particular oil is great for calming. I deal with depression and stress so that's why I've been getting into aromatherapy and essential oils lately. So how do I use this lavender essential oil? Well I use it as aromatherapy of course. I must warn you if you're not familiar with this scent it can be rather strong to you at first. This isn't a cheap body wash product that has imitation of lavender, this is the real stuff. With that being said I think it's wise to use this when you want to be calm and are at home relaxing.I was given this product at a highly discounted rate in exchange for a review but I'm happy to report that this is a product I honestly love. In fact, I just used some of it before I started writing this review and I'm at ease and totally relaxed right now. I really recommend this to those who want to calm down.

I was having a hard time finding the album version but came across this live version. I do like this version because it's full of energy. I recommend this to anyone who wants to feel the rush of live music.

Katy Perry is the "Pop Princess" for adults. That's really the only way that I can describe her. Her songs are fun and catchy but they have a hard edge to them. This is an explicit album meaning that there is foul language in it. Even if you bought the "clean" version though she makes references to harder things, such as drugs and sex. I think overall she's a nice balance though as her songs are rather meaningful for the most part. It might not seem like that with her poppy image and radio presence but I think she's great at songwriting. After all, she did start out in the industry as a song writer.

This was bought for my cousin's baby who is now 6 months old. This is a board book which means it can handle being tugged at which is something babies love to do to books! This is a really nice beginner book and I think it's perfect for even being the FIRST book shown to a baby.I got the gift set which came with two books of the same size. These books are rather small and that's a good thing! It's the perfect size for a baby to hold on to and so far I haven't heard any reports of the baby ripping it apart.I really recommend this to anyone with a baby. I think it's a great gift set to be given and it's a timeless and classic story.

I was really pleasantly surprised when I received this brush set. It ended up being a lot bigger than I thought it was going to be which is a good thing to me! I measured the case itself to be about 14 and a half inches long with all the brushes being longer than 10 inches each.This is a really nice set that I think all painters would love. It truly is nice enough for even professional painters to use. I really love that the thinner brushes even have a plastic tube protector on the tips. I feel like these brushes were built to last and this case does a good job protecting them. I really like that there's such a large assortment of different brushes. There are 15 of them and each are different which means this set probably has the brush you want/need.I think the case is really nice because it can be turned into a stand on both sides. Simply just pull the velcro panel on each side and it will stand up. The case closes with a zipper. Overall the case reminds me of one of those higher end binders that are used for school. I believe the brand was "5 Star" is what I'm referring to. This case for the brushes remind me of one of those binders which I think means that it should last and protect the brushes well.Please note I was able to get this set at a highly discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased review. I really do enjoy this set and it's a really great way to store brushes.

I think that this is a great makeup set that would be perfect for travel or for around the house. I think it would be good even for the house because it really is a great way to hold your brushes without them being spread all over the place.The container itself I measured to be 6 inches long which was actually bigger than I was expecting so I'm happy about that. I love the "tin" it's in and I feel like it can really protect the brushes which is why this is perfect for travel. I like the color of it as well but to me I think it's more of a purply pink than straight pink, like a metallic pink.The brushes are very soft. They each have a different shape so you can create some interesting makeup styles. I recommend this set to those who enjoy wearing eye makeup. I also think that these brushes would be good for mineral makeup.Please note I was given this set in exchange for an unbiased review.

Well this is different from your regular mouse "trap" because it doesn't really kill them. It's basically an extremely sticky device that will catch the mouse and won't let it go. With that being said, if you do not find the mice it can possibly die from being stuck to it for too long and not being able to get out and be free, so keep that in mind if you are trying to be humane.These are great traps though! I actually prefer them over the regular traps with the cheese because these are much easier to set up. Not to mention you don't have to worry about them accidentally going off on you or other animals, i.e. cats, that shouldn't be messing around with them.Please take note I was provided with free samples of this product but I have enjoyed this product so much that I do plan on buying them in the future. I really recommend these to those who do not like how "regular" mouse traps work and want an easier way to catch and dispose of mice in and around your house.

I just love Sun Chips! I do not, however, like spicy things in general but these chips are not THAT spicy! The first time I had these chips I was a little hesitant because of the words "Garden Salsa" on them since when I think of salsa I think of spicy. There is a little kick to them but it's not at all as spicy as one would think. If anything they have a fresh salsa taste to them, like someone just made salsa from the vegetables that were growing in the garden that's growing in your backyard!So these chips are absolutely wonderful and are my favorite Sun Chips. I recommend them to those who enjoy a fresh tasting chip. They do have an overall more healthy taste to them, as they should since they are made with whole grain. Pair these with a freshly made sandwich that has fresh ingredients and a water or iced tea and you're going to have an amazingly fresh tasting meal!

A "coloring book" is a weird concept on the Kindle. I do love this app but I have a hard time calling it a "coloring book". To me a coloring book you're actually using something, a marker, pencil, crayon, etc., and physically coloring with each stroke. This app you're using a stylus or finger (I just use my finger) and you simply just touch each section and it will fill in the area with the color you want. It's enjoyable to me but it still is not exactly like a coloring book.This is one of those apps where you have to spend money to "unlock" everything. You are given several pages and colors with the app but if you want to really get creative and have a wider range of colors to choose from and bigger selection of pages you'll need to "unlock" each thing by buying them. Sometimes apps that do that disappoint me which is why I've given the app just 4 stars instead of 5 because you are only given 2 color palettes to choose from right away.Another reason why I couldn't give a full 5 star rating was when sharing time came. I couldn't easily share after selecting the share button which was a little disappointing. I ended up getting the share button to work after restarting the app but I don't know why it wouldn't quite work at first.

I have seen others say that their body gets used to a deodorant and thus the product doesn't work as well after a couple months or so of use. With that being said, for right now this product has been working amazingly for me. I was a little skeptical with the gel because for some reason I've had this idea that gels were for men so I never used a gel deodorant before. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the gel dried very fast! I put it on and it felt like only a couple seconds later it dried on me! This was a good thing to me.This deodorant is amazing to me and lasts...I mean it really lasts. I tested it and didn't put on deodorant the next day one time and it was still working! In fact, I've tried the clinical strength deodorant and I find this Secret Outlast deodorant to actually work better and longer!I recommend this deodorant for those who have long days and want to stay dry and fresh smelling throughout the whole day. For me personally I deal with the issue that many other woman deal with and that's having deodorant not work after awhile after continue use. I do love this particular deodorant the best right now so what I do is rotate through my deodorants. I will simply use a more plain deodorant when I plan on staying home for the day but when I go out now I want this Secret Outlast especially if it's going to be a hot day and I know I'm going to sweat.Please note I received this item as a free sample through Bzzagent but I did in fact like this product so much that I do intend on buying it again.

It's advertised as a mobile mouse pad but honestly I use this as my main mouse pad. I usually don't like spending too much on a mouse pad but for around $20 this is a great mouse pad. It's not that big at all but I put it on my desk long ways so that I can slide my mouse up and down instead of back and forth side to side.I mainly play League of Legends for the PC and I use this mouse pad with my Razer Deathadder Chroma mouse. It's amazing and together they work perfectly. The mouse smoothly slides on this mouse pad and stays on my desk when I use it. I have a glass desk and the mouse pad stays put which is something other mouse pads might not do.When you get this mouse pad it'll come rolled up in the packaging. Save this packaging! It really doesn't take up that much room at all and I use it when I travel. I just roll up the mouse pad and put it in it's original packaging and since the packaging is rather sturdy it protects the mouse pad.I think this is a great mouse pad and I recommend it to anyone really. It's so much better than one of those cheap pads and it's really nice for gaming.

I've had many gaming mice over the years from various brands and this is by far my favorite mouse. I've had Razer mouse before but the problem I had in the past is that the mice were just too small. This particular mouse is much bigger than other Razer mice I have used which is perfect for me because I have somewhat "bigger" hands. (even though I'm a girl!)I mainly play a game called League of Legends and this mouse is perfect for it. Another game that I regularly play is Orcs Must Die 2. In that game I play a mage and there is so much clicking in it my arm actually tires from it every now and then. This mouse is able to handle the constant clicking. I'm reviewing this mouse several months after owning it and it's still preforming as well as I first bought it. I game a good 5-8 hours a day (I'm actually on a competitive League of Legends ranked team) so that's pretty good that it's last this long to me.I love the color scheme. It's on a constant rotation that rotates through all of the colors in a rainbow and it's beautifully done. It just doesn't go from one color to the next it actually smoothly transforms into the next color creating a wonderful light show. It's not distracting at all when gaming which is a plus. Honestly it's something that probably won't even be noticed when using it because your hand covers the lights for the most part when using it.I recommend this to those who play games that click a lot and someone who needs a mouse that's easily gripable. I stated before that i have bigger hands but I don't know if that translates to the size of guy hands since I'm a girl. I think your best bet is to go to a store, like Best Buy, who has the mouse on display to feel in person if it's the right fit for you. I can say though that I recommend buying this mouse on Amazon and not Best Buy though because it's much cheaper on here than at Best Buy.

Well what can I say it turned up on time its looked like rain all day but it works i put it in the window and it started to charge my power bank if it works with my power bank it will work with any it works on the Nokia Lumina windows 8 phone it runs my usb fan i don't know how Long its takes to charge em all full but on a clouded day it runs a usb fan directly most realistic affordable solar solution to me thanks its 20:47 in the evening its still charging
This was a really good book full of short hot, juicy passion. My husband and I read most of them together and to see him get revved up was.....let's just say wonderful! It's all about imagination.

Works great with Nexus 7 32GB Tablet (Gen 2). Very convenient to use. I have it plugged in at the ready and when I'm done using the tablet I automatically place it on the charging pad so that the tablet is always charged up. Eliminates the annoyance of having to plug in the micro usb cable and risk damaging the connector on the tablet due to incorrect placement. The charging pad is small and takes up much less space than the tablet itself.

This charging station is perfect for the travelers who charge multiple devices. It's organized, and so simple to use. When traveling, this helps keep us organized and there is no more looking for several plugs in a hotel room. It's one and done.

Sound quality is great, headphones are really very comfortable.I use them to watch movies on my laptop, my husband uses them for playing games on the computer and we are both very satisfied. great sound and hands free mic! The only thing negative is that Amazon didn't pack it right and the packaging was damaged but not the product. Not really the sellers fault.

No difference between these and Brother cartridges. Saved us some money, we'll definitely consider these again next time around. Cartridges were remanufactured well from Brother cartridges, and printed as expected.

It was much better than I expected. I looked for weeks to find the rug I wanted to build my new living room look around and this one is perfect. Brought a real splash of color to our living room. I have to admit, this was my first foray into contemporary interior design and I was nervous. I fell in love with this rug online, but didn't know if it would be the right accent piece for the other furniture and patterns in the room. I was first impressed by the workmanship of the rug. I was concerned it would be too 'busy', but it has a noticeable presence, but does not overpower the room, as I feared it might. Definitely happy with my purchase from BestBuysLLC!

This item is exactly as described. It is extremely easy to assemble and works exactly as described. Cooks great and is safe to use. Are there better grills this size, maybe. Are there better grills this size and price, I don't believe it. You get a great deal more than you pay for and will be extremely happy with it. So easy to clean as well!! My dog (a golden retriever) loves this beef food roll. I mix little pieces in with her regular food for a soft treat and also carry a plastic bag of cut pieces around to use as a training reward. Well worth the money. One roll lasts us an entire month for 1 dog.

I love these bowls. They are perfect for my miniature daschund and for traveling. They fold flat and then pop up when you need them. I ordered 1 and loved it so much that I ordered a second. Highly recommend
The Car Seat Safety Belt worked great for my dog. It was long enough so that my dog can get comfortable and not get tangeled or mangled. It was affordable enough that I ordered 2 for our family cars.

This cover is made from high quality heavy duty vinyl. It is weather resistant, crack resistant and have UV protection. Just try it and after started wear out you will glad to find the 7553 premium covers from Texas grill covers. Its keep your grills clean through heavy rain, dust storms and windy condition. The vinyl version is really thick. Fits Weber Genesis E and S series grills, it's excellent in fit. And assure that you will get quality at a competitive price. It has the straps Velcro tie downs that are adjustable to tighten the cover to the grill to keep it from blowing off and to stay covered. The Grill Brush and Tongs included, is a great bonus.

This leggings are super cute. I got this for my friend as a gift. The fit was perfect, she loves them and the look great on her. These are a very stretch and comfortable material that fits like a glove. The color is great!
Just as expected! Super fast shipping. Good quality and happy with this buy! I would buy this again as a gift!
This is probably the cheapest battery supply on Amazon and it works like a dream!!Keeps my S3 going for a days worth of Ingress.Worth getting.

This is a green product, very easy to carry and use. You can put this product in the car during the sunshine and recharge your GPS Units, iPhone, iPod, Samsung...... Also this product is very light, easy carries it.

These items are a great value for money. Kids can use them to put all of their stationary and utensils in, teachers can do the same, and they can be used just to keep things around the house tidy and organized! They also come in great colours and designs, which are great for kids in school, and it also makes you feel better having your stuff in a neat looking zipper bag. These are also really durable, so if you plan on going to the park with your kids you know their stationary won't be damaged. But the durability means that even builders and contractors can use them - they already have so many tools to keep track of, they won't need to worry about looking for a pen anymore!

This vest is really lightweight and easy to put on, this helps if you are doing heavy duty work as it stops you feeling restricted and getting overheated so you can get your task done quickly. It's also highly reflected so you feel safe when working at night and crossing the roads as you know that vehicles or other road users will see you clearly. The vest is really durable and real value for money, you can wear it whilst doing a wide range of activities. Plus, the little bands that it comes with are great for people with children or pets as you can put these around their wrists or collars, again reassuring you that they are safe on the roads or at night.

These are as nice as they look in the photos: heavy, good quality hardwood with a clear finish and perfect for eating while viewing TV and for gatherings when extra dining space is needed (would work great on the patio or deck, too, but not made for regular exposure to inclement weather). The trays are fully assembled and ready to use, and the stand comes with a diagram, all the hardware and the one tool (a hex key) needed to put it together. An excellent and recommended value.

I was having pain in my upper left back area that was exacerbated by prolonged sitting in the car or in seats without support. Even the seats at the movie theater left me in pain. I put one of these supports in my car and in my chair at the office. I also put one in the trunk of my car to take with me to the theater. They work like a charm. The one in my car wore out, so I just ordered six and plan to give some away to a friend with back problems. The price is certainly right!

looked good just what i wanted to trick charge leisure battery when not in use.i put permanent battery plug onto battery and just plug in when i want and leave the panel on my back seats.delivered next day on a Sunday which i thought very good.bought quite a lot off amazon and never had trouble.

Has come in handy on long trips. Great that it can charge either via wall socket or solar. You'll probably get half or even three quarters charged when put out in the sun all day. Longer if in ambient light. Will charge my phone fully and still has capacity for half charging another phone. Nice!

With so many devices being charged via USB these portable battery chargers are becoming increasingly popular for those who need to top up on the go. This battery holds a massive 50000mAh, which is enough to keep charging a single mobile over and over again. I charged my HTC One X from only this for a week and it showed no signs of running low on power.The battery has 2 USB charging ports on it so you can, for example, easily charge a mobile and a tablet at the same time. I also liked the addition of a torch which is activated by a double press of the only button on the battery. This really adds to the use of the battery and makes it really handy to keep in the car or take camping.But you only get one cable. For most this isn't really an issue, it's likely you will just use your existing USB cable, but the addition of a carry case for the battery and accessories would make this an even more brilliant travel gadget.

Excellent product. Re-charges exactly what it promises (sadly not my new bargain HP Touchpad for some reason). A touch heavy but it is much higher capacity than most other battery packs. Would be good to if you could top it up by charging from a USB port, save having to have the dedicated mains charger with you away on trips but would mean that in a long day in the office the battery would be back in fully charged state.Does seem to charge much faster than other chargers, my BB in particular seems to take about half as long to charge with the battery pack than via USB from the computer.So I can see no reason not to get one of these if you are in the market.

Free energy from the sun , very handy when you are climbing. I keep it in my backpack every time when I go outside. I don't know why everybody complaints about the qulity. It is the best solar charger I have ever bought. Love it!!

Fantastic product so far, got it on time and have been using it in the glorious sunshine we have had over the last few days, works as I expect it to, if you have bright sunshine then it'll power with no issues, if you have a cloudy day then it'll only charge when there's sunshine available to charge it.Charged my phone in 3/4 hours from dead to fully charged. Love the fact that you can charge it from your PC and then top it up using the sunshine. It's exactly what I wanted, something to charge phones, mp3 players, gopros, psp's etc...

A fantastic product that even drains light when there is barely any, also the customer services and this company is fantastic as they replied to us within 3 hours. The product has a very quick solar charge of 6 hours charging, and can charge my ipod 4 times over!

I purchased these for my toddlers and I was skeptical at first of purchasing these eggs because of the reviews but when I finally saw how they worked and how much my young ones were excited about the whole hatching process, it turned out to be a wonderful purchase. The eggs shipped to my house promptly and arrived in perfect condition. The eggs took a little over a day to hatch and the pets inside are very cute looking and make good toys for the kids! Overall, this is a wonderful product and I will surely be recommending them to my friends with kids around the same age as mine!

I decided to buy the 3 pack at first to see how well they worked before buying more. All in all, I was thoroughly pleased with the shipping time, the condition of the eggs when they arrived, and the overall hatching process, which was especially enjoyed by my youngest son. I will definitely be purchasing more of these eggs in the near future!
I haven't had this much fun reading a new author in a long time. This is a traditional, swashbuckler story. Action, excitement, a new world. It's a wonderful creation. I can't wait for the next one.

This is a very sneaky book. Nothing is really the way it first appears and the hero can trust absolutely no one! It's nonstop action from start to finish and very exciting. The author paints a fascinating picture of Washington politics. This is a must read for anyone who likes political thrillers.

The Panasonic Multi-Functional Wet/Dry Shaver and Epilator comes with Five Attachments and Travel Pouch.
